title: CRITICAL STUDIES OF INTERACTIVE MEDIA AND GAMES
description:
Cat. I
 
This course introduces non-technical studies of computer-based interactive 
media and games. The course develops a vocabulary for discussing games and
 other interactive media, and tools for analyzing them. Students are expected to 
provide written critiques using the critical approaches presented in the course. 
The games and other interactive media critiqued may be commercially available 
or under development.
